name: Expiring Organizations
title: Expiring Organizations
body:
Original Confluence URL: https://qbdocs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/1LS/pages/3467444225/Expiring+Organizations - please cross-check the quality of the ZD article with the Confluence counterpart and remove this line before publishing the ZD article

Overview

This article provides a comprehensive guide on managing expiring organizations in the Tivian system. It outlines the step-by-step process for identifying, communicating about, and handling organizations that are approaching their expiration date.

 

Information

This guide is primarily intended for 1st level support team members who are responsible for the monthly task of managing expiring organizations. It covers the entire process from obtaining the list of expiring organizations to extending or deleting them based on sales representatives' feedback.

 

  • Create Collective Ticket
  • Receive List of Expiring Organizations
  • Find Contact Person
  • Raise Ticket for Sales Representative
  • Link New Ticket to Collective Ticket
  • Follow Up with Sales Representative
  • Extend or Delete Organization
  • Close Tickets
  • Example Wording for Communication

 

Create Collective Ticket

Step 0

Create a Collective Ticket in the JSM portal with the name "Expiring Organisations [DATE]" (e.g., "Expiring Organisations 01.03.2022"). In this ticket, request a list from 2nd level support of all organizations expiring on the specified date.

 

Receive List of Expiring Organizations

Step 1

1st level support receives the list of expiring organizations via JSM from 2nd level support in the collective ticket.

 

Find Contact Person

Step 2

Identify the contact person in Sales for each organization and make a note in the organization's record.

 

Raise Ticket for Sales Representative

Step 3

Create a ticket via the JSM portal for each responsible Sales Representative, including all organizations that belong to them. Add the Sales Representative as a Request Participant.

 

Link New Ticket to Collective Ticket

Step 4

Link the newly created ticket for each Sales Representative to the collective ticket.

 

Follow Up with Sales Representative

Step 5

If you don't receive a reply from the Sales Representative and an organization is at risk of expiring, follow up via the ticket or Teams. Set a reminder to ensure the task is completed.

 

Extend or Delete Organization

Step 6

Based on the Sales Representative's response, either extend the organization's expiry date or initiate the deletion process:

Step 6a: Extend organization

  • Edit the Expiry Date in EFS
  • Make a note for documentation (e.g., TIVI-20, 04.06.2021, extended by 1 year, fwo)
  • Save correspondence with Sales in the ticket

Step 6b: Delete organization

  • Save correspondence with Sales in the ticket
  • Open a new ticket for Sabine
  • Sabine will delete the organization on the date specified by Sales
  • Link the new ticket to the ticket with the Sales Representative

 

Close Tickets

Step 7

Once you have received definitive feedback on each organization and implemented the necessary actions, close the ticket with the Sales Representative.

Step 8

After receiving feedback from all Sales Representatives and extending or deleting the organizations accordingly, close the collective ticket.

 

Example Wording for Communication

English Version

Hello,

I have (two) expiring organisations for you (see below). Please confirm which one you want me to renew or delete.
If you want me to renew an organisation, please tell me the new expiration date.
If you want me to delete an organisation, please tell me when to delete it.

Please note what happens when an organisation expires:

All users of the organisation can no longer log in to the named installation.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

German Version

Hallo,

Kannst du mir zu den drei Organisationen einmal mitteilen, ob diese verlängert oder gelöscht werden sollen?

Wenn ich eine Organisation verlängern soll, schreib mir bitte für wie lange ich dies tun soll.

Wenn eine Organisation gelöscht werden soll, bitte schreibe mir zu wann diese gelöscht werden soll.

Was passiert wenn eine Organisation ausläuft?

Alle Benutzer der Organisation können sich auf der genannten Installation nicht mehr einloggen.

Danke und VG
[Ihr Name]

 

FAQ

What should I do if I don't receive a response from a Sales Representative?

If you don't receive a reply from a Sales Representative and an organization is at risk of expiring, follow up via the ticket or Teams. Set a reminder for yourself to ensure that the task is completed.

How do I handle the Ipsos organization?

Ipsos is an exception to the standard process. They always extend for 10 years or longer. In this case, just provide a quick update to Christian Kamp.

Where can I find the contact information for Sales Representatives?

You can find an overview of current clients and Sales contact persons for Germany in the internal documentation. Refer to the "Overview of current clients and Sales contact person Germany" document for this information.

 

Tags: expiring organizations, account management, sales coordination, customer retention, EFS, organization extension, organization deletion
